greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A007318 * M, where M = triangle in which row n consists of n-1 zeros followed by 2n-1, n+1.
formula: Binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular matrix with rows = (n-1) zeros followed by (2n-1), (n+1). A007318 * an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1,2,3,...) in the main diagonal, (1,3,5,...) in the subdiagonal and the rest zeros.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
